data.name: MsgStartClosedPeriodEndFebWarningPara1

data.name: lblAbout_this_service_line1

data.value: You can use the recommendations and outputs from NMPT-GB to demonstrate compliance with environmental regulations. This tool will warn you if you enter field or nutrient management information that will breach rules relating to inorganic fertilisers, organic manures or other materials containing nitrogen.

Creating a plan or report will also save your data.

data.name: lblCrossBorderHoldingsContent1
data.value: Farmers with a cross-border holding (a farm with land in more than one part of Great Britain) will need to set up 2 separate farms - one in each region - and manage them separately within NMPT-GB.

data.name: lblCrossBorderHoldingsContent2
data.value: For instance, if your holding has land in both England and Scotland, you would need to create 2 farms in NMPT-GB.

data.name: lblCrossBorderHoldingsContent3
data.value: This means that NMPT-GB will be using the appropriate calculations and following the relevant regulations for each farm.

data.name: lblCurrentFunctionContent1

data.name: lblSoil_Analysis_line5
